messages.message:
Welcome to the Bithir's collection of mods


This is a small collection of mods to enhance your experience of the Dragonbane system for Foundry.
If you want to give some feedback on the module, Bithir is active on both the Foundry Discord (channel #free-league) and Dragonbane Discord.

Bithir's Dragonbane Mod


This have now been updated for Foundry VTT v13.
